# the [[azarole]], the shrub or tree that produces the [[azerole]], {{taxfmt|Crataegus azarolus|species}}
types.html:
azérolier m (plural azéroliers)

  1. the azarole, the shrub or tree that produces the azerole, Crataegus azarolus
trans: the azarole, the shrub or tree that produces the azerole, Crataegus azarolus
